creator: SebTardif@ncf.ca
text:
servletContext.getAttribute("javax.servlet.context.tempdir") return a path that do not exist because the end of the path finish with an underscore like .../xyz/_

xyz exist but not _

1. Can you reproduce this on the up-to-date version of Tomcat 7 (7.0.26)?
2. How to reproduce this,  step-by-step?
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com

text: Tomcat only sets this in one place and if the directory can't be created there will be a warning in the logs. There are multiple reasons why it might not be possible for Tomcat to create the directory and the users list is the place to seek further assistance.
creator: markt@apache.org
